assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Atypical_Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome_Initial_First_Presentation_of_Recurrent_Q20
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: a) Provide a clinical synopsis ruling out the other causes of current TMA listed in Section A part 1, include results for transplant-specific causes of TMA including CMV, Parvovirus B19, etc...
